whyMonkey.title: And why Monkey-co?
whyMonkey.description: Monkey-co embodies the idea that ecological transition can be simple, fun and accessible to everyone. The name evokes community ("co"), agility and an uncomplicated approach to green finance. Like our primate cousins who adapt to their environment, we create agile solutions for a sustainable future.
